steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Marinate (optional): In a small bowl, whisk garlic, lemon juice, olive oil, oregano, salt, pepper. Pour over chicken; let sit ~10 minutes.
Bake: Place chicken in a baking dish. Bake ~25–30 minutes or until cooked through (internal temp 165°F).
Serve with roasted veggies or a side salad.

ingredientsNeeded: 1 lb chicken breasts, diced or shredded
Tortilla chips or strips for garnish
steps: Sauté onions & peppers: In a large pot, cook onions and peppers in a little oil.
Add chicken: Cook until no longer pink.
Combine: Stir in tomatoes, beans, broth, chili powder, cumin, salt, pepper.
Simmer: Bring to boil, reduce heat, simmer ~20 minutes.
Serve: Top with tortilla chips, fresh cilantro, or cheese if desired.

recipes.recipeName: Ground Chicken Meatballs with Veggie Sauce
ingredientsNeeded: 1 onion, finely chopped (half for meatballs, half for sauce)
1 can crushed tomatoes or tomato sauce
1 cup finely chopped veggies (mushrooms, carrots, zucchini)
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Mix meatballs: Combine ground chicken, breadcrumbs, egg, half the chopped onion, garlic, salt, pepper, herbs. Form into small balls.
Bake: Place on a baking sheet; bake ~15–20 minutes or until golden and cooked through.
Sauce: Meanwhile, sauté remaining onion and chopped veggies in a pan. Add crushed tomatoes. Season with salt, pepper, herbs. Simmer.
Combine: Add baked meatballs to the sauce. Simmer a few minutes.
Serve over whole grains or with a vegetable side.

ingredientsNeeded: 1 lb chicken breasts, diced small (or ground chicken)
2 Tbsp hoisin sauce or soy sauce + a pinch of sugar
1 Tbsp cornstarch mixed with 2 Tbsp water (optional)
Optional veggies: diced bell pepper, shredded carrots
steps: Cook chicken: In a skillet with a little oil, cook chicken, onion, and garlic until chicken is done.
Sauce: Stir in hoisin/soy sauce mixture. If you want thicker sauce, add cornstarch slurry. Let simmer 1–2 minutes.
Fill lettuce wraps: Spoon chicken mixture into lettuce leaves. Top with chopped veggies, scallions, or sesame seeds if desired.

recipes.recipeName: Slow-Cooker Beef Roast with Carrots & Potatoes
recipes.prepTime: ~15 minutes (+ 6–8 hours slow-cooker OR ~3 hours in oven)
ingredientsNeeded: ~1 lb beef roast (chuck or round roast)
2 carrots, peeled and cut into chunks
2 potatoes or sweet potatoes, cut into chunks
steps: Sear roast (optional): In a hot skillet, brown each side of the roast for extra flavor.
Layer: Place carrots, potatoes, onion in slow-cooker. Season with salt, pepper. Put roast on top.
Add broth: Pour in ~1 cup beef broth. Add rosemary/thyme.
Cook: Cover and cook on low 6–8 hours or until beef is tender.
Serve: Shred or slice beef; serve with veggies and cooking juices.

ingredientsNeeded: 8 oz whole wheat fettuccine (or pasta of choice)
¼ cup grated Parmesan cheese (adjust to taste)
steps: Cook pasta: According to package instructions. Reserve ~½ cup pasta water.
Cook chicken: In a skillet, heat 1 Tbsp oil/butter. Sauté sliced chicken until cooked through. Remove and set aside.

Make sauce: In the same pan, add remaining oil/butter and garlic. Sauté ~1 minute. Slowly pour in milk or half-and-half, stirring. Add Parmesan; stir until slightly thickened. Use reserved pasta water if needed.
Combine: Return chicken to sauce; add spinach/kale if desired. Season with salt, pepper.
Toss in pasta: Stir pasta into sauce. Serve immediately.
